creditline: Gift of funds from William Neumann and James Boyle
medium: Oil, pastel, acrylic, photo transfer, and fabric on canvas
text: An older Black woman sits on a sofa. She is dressed casually in sweatpants and slippers. Below her feet are photo-transfers of family pictures and collaged fabric squares. Behind her, blue, purple and yellow brush strokes fade into a white wall or backdrop. A lamp is sketched out in pale pink paint to the right of the sitter.
title: Ellen Barlow
